roleset.name: to speak or move in a confused way

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Mr. Dinkins concedes nothing in his ability to stumble and bumble .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Surprisingly , Shane Longman survives the week , only [*] to have a senior executive innocently bumble his way into [*]becoming the target of a criminal insider trading investigation .
example.arg: into [*]becoming the target of a criminal insider trading investigation

roleset.note: BUMBLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bumble' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from bumble.01-v predicate notes)
